overview: We conclude the Campus Boyz trilogy with the conversion of our str8boy Eric, as he finally gets his wish, and we initiate some new Cobraboyz. David and Cain start off with a couple of hot solos, then our new angel Cobraboy Brandon gets groped by a friend as he sleeps, then later describes how he seduced another str8boy, Damian, the night before. Ethan and Kevin are hot in a tub, Travis teaches two new boyz how to suck his big pistol and, of course, the very hot final scene with our now converted Eric and Ethan.
title: Campus Boyz III
